彋字的基本解释

彋
hóng
〔弸（
p唍g ）彋〕a.风吹动帷帐的声音，如“帷彋彋其拂汩兮。”b.帷帐被风吹得鼓起的样子。

彋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户盲切，平庚，匣。］
［《廣韻》户萌切，平耕，匣。］
见“弸彋”。

彋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　彋； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页361第08
【廣韻】戸萌切，音宏。【玉篇】弸彋，帷帳起貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】惟弸彋其拂汨兮。【註】弸彋，風吹帷帳之聲也。　又【集韻】弸彋，弓聲。　又【廣韻】戸盲切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡盲切，?音橫。又【類篇】洪孤切，音胡。義?同。

彋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
彋字的起名意思

暂无。

彋
Basic explanation of words
彋
hóng
〔full(
p唍g )彋〕a. The sound of the wind blowing the curtains, such as "The curtains are blowing." b. The curtains are blown up by the wind.
彋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" household blind cut, Ping Geng, box. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Meng cut, flat farming, box. ]
See "弸彋".
彋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　彋; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: Page 361 08
[Guang Yun] 戸 Meng cut, sound macro. [Jade articles] 弸彋, the curtains look up. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Only 弸彋其汨汨xi. 【Note】弸彋, the sound of the wind blowing curtains.　[Jiyun] 弸彋, bow sound.　[Guangyun] Blind cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Hu blind cut,? The sound is horizontal. Also 【Classes】Hong Guqie, Yinhu. Righteous? Same.
彋
